Details

Transcript Transform: remove unnecessary default reports. We'll scan the transcript for default reports for actions which also have implicit announcements or non-default reports, and remove those default reports. We'll also remove default descriptive reports which also have non-default reports in the same action. **`defaultReportTransform`**` :   `[`TranscriptTransform`](../object/TranscriptTransform.html)
